/* Transparent Menus (regular conditions): */
popup:not(#autoscroller) 
{
  opacity:0.59 !important;
      transition: opacity 0.4s !important;
  box-shadow: 0px 8px 8px !important;
}

/* Custom (or remove) transparency when hovering over menu */
popup:not(#autoscroller):hover
{
  opacity: 1.00 !important;
   transition: opacity 0.4s !important;
  box-shadow: 0px 16px 16px
}

menupopup:not(#autoscroller)
{
  opacity:0.59 !important;
      transition: opacity 0.4s !important;
  box-shadow: 0px 8px 8px !important;
}
menupopup:not(#autoscroller):hover
{
  opacity: 1.00 !important;
      transition: opacity 0.4s !important;
  box-shadow: 0px -6px 16px
}

/* AGENT_SHEET */

scrollbar[orient="vertical"] 
{-moz-appearance: none !important;
border: none !important;
background: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important;}

scrollbar[orient="horizontal"]
{-moz-appearance: none !important;
border: none !important;
background: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important;}

scrollbar thumb[orient="vertical"]
{-moz-appearance: none !important;
border: none !important;
background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #FF0000, #00FFFF) !important;
border-radius: 6px !important;}

scrollbar thumb[orient="horizontal"]
{-moz-appearance: none !important;
border: none !important;
background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, #FF0000, #00FFFF) !important;
border-radius: 6px !important;}

scrollbar thumb[orient="vertical"]:hover
{-moz-appearance: none !important;
border: none !important;
background: -moz-linear-gradient(bottom, #FF0000, #00FFFF) !important;
border-radius: 6px !important;}

scrollbar thumb[orient="horizontal"]:hover
{-moz-appearance: none !important;
border: none !important;
background: -moz-linear-gradient(right, #FF0000, #00FFFF) !important;
border-radius: 6px !important;}

scrollbar scrollbarbutton, scrollbar gripper
{-moz-appearance: none ! important;
background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important;
min-height: 14px !important;
max-height: 14px !important;
min-width: 14px !important;
max-width: 14px !important;
border: none !important;
border-radius: 25px !important;
box-shadow: 0 0 4px 1px #000000 !important;}

@-moz-document url('chrome://browser/content/browser.xul')
{
	.tab-throbber { list-style-image: url("file:///<redacted>/throbber.gif") !important; }
	.tab-throbber[progress] { list-style-image: url("file:///<redacted>/throbber.gif") !important; }
}

/* ==== ONGLETS - COULEURS DIFFÉRENTES - OK AUSTRALIS : DÉBUT ==== */
	/* Suppression des onglets Firefox 29 (Australis) */
	/* Remove New Australis tabs */
#TabsToolbar .tab-background-start,
#TabsToolbar .tab-background-end{
   display: none !important;
}
#TabsToolbar .tab-background-middle,
#TabsToolbar .tab-background{
   background: none !important;
}
	/* Les 14 premiers onglets sont d'une couleur différente, les suivants reprennent la couleur des premiers */
	/* The first 14 tabs are of a different color, the following show the color of the firsts */

	/* Définition des onglets */
	/* Définition of tabs */
.tabbrowser-tabs tab{overflow-x: hidden !important;}
.tabbrowser-tabs .tabbrowser-tab{
   vertical-align: top !important;
   -moz-box-sizing: border-box !important;
   min-width: 150px !important;
}
	/* onglets inactifs */
	/* Inactive tabs */
.tabbrowser-tabs tab:not([selected="true"]){
   opacity: 0.1 !important;
}

.tabbrowser-tabs tab[selected="true"]{
   opacity: 1.0!important;
}

	/* onglet survolé par la souris */
	/* Tab overed */
.tabbrowser-tabs tab:hover{
   opacity: 0.8 !important;
}
	/* onglets en chargement */
	/* Tabs in loading */
.tabbrowser-tabs tab[busy]{
   background: Grey !important;
   color: Gold !important;
}
	/* Adaptation du bouton "Nouvel onglet" */
	/* Adaptation of the button "New tab" */
.tabs-newtab-button{
   -moz-appearance:none !important;
   visibility: visible !important;
   background-color: #FF0000 !important;
}

	/* Adaptation du bouton "Tous les onglets" */
	/* Adaptation of the button "All tabs" */
.tabs-alltabs-button{background-color: Beige !important;}
/* ==== ONGLETS - COULEURS DIFFÉRENTES : FIN ==== */

/* easily customisable tabs: NO IMAGES; just google the
   balise if you don't understand how it works.
   If you do change colors, please create another style,
   it would avoid the loss of your settings */
   
tab.tabbrowser-tab
{  background: rgba(0,255,255,0.4) !important;
   font-size: 24pt !important;
   text-shadow: #000000 0px 0px 6px, #000000 0px 0px 6px,#000000 0px 0px 6px !important;
   margin-right: 2px !important;
   -moz-border-image: none !important;
   border-radius: 25px 25px 0px 0px !important;
   border-width: 1px !important;
   border-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5) !important;
   -moz-border-left-colors:none !important;
   -moz-border-right-colors:none !important;
   -moz-border-top-colors:none !important;
}

@-moz-document url(chrome://browser/content/browser.xul) {
/* 
Adjust font-size to change size of icons.
Box size can be changed with padding,
width, and height properties 
*/

#titlebar-min,
#titlebar-max,
#titlebar-close {
-moz-appearance: none !important;
-moz-box-sizing: content-box !important;
margin: 0;
margin-left: 3px;
border: none;
font-size: 12px;
width: 24px;
border-radius: 3px;
box-shadow: inset 0 0 2px #000;
}

/*
=============
Icons order:
 Minimize
 Windows
 Close
 Maximize
=============
*/

#titlebar-min label::after {
content:"\23EC" !important;
}

#titlebar-max label::after {
content:"\259E" !important;
}

#titlebar-close label::after {
content:"\274C" !important;
}

#main-window[sizemode="normal"] #titlebar-max label::after {
content:"\2B1B"  !important;
}

/* ==== colors */

#titlebar-min,
#titlebar-max {
background: linear-gradient(#666,#333);
color: #eee !important;
}

#titlebar-min:hover,
#titlebar-max:hover {
background: linear-gradient(#589CCF,#43749C);
}

#titlebar-close {
color: #fff;
background: linear-gradient(#CE4E31,#9b3a24);
}

#titlebar-close:hover {
background: linear-gradient(#FF613D,#CC4D2F);
}

}

tab .tab-icon, .tab-icon-image, .tab-throbber {
  filter: grayscale(1);
}

#TabsToolbar .tabbrowser-tab[selected] .tab-icon, #TabsToolbar .tabbrowser-tab[selected] .tab-icon-image, #TabsToolbar .tabbrowser-tab[selected] .tab-throbber {
  filter: grayscale(0);
}

/* GENERAL */
tooltip {
-moz-appearance: none !important;
opacity: 0.95 !important;
padding: 12px !important;
border-image-source: url("data:image/png;base64,") !important;
border-image-slice: 15 fill !important;
border-image-width: 15px !important;
border-image-repeat: repeat !important;
background: none !important;
box-shadow: none !important;
}
tooltip label {
margin: 0px !important;
padding: 0px 3px 4px !important;
color: #fff !important;
   text-align: center !important;
font-family: Space Invaders !important;
font-size: 12pt !important;

 _______________________________________________________________________

|         Author:  |  -=Ben=-                                           |

|   Last Updated:  |  November 24, 2008                                 |

/* Transparent Menus (regular conditions): */
popup:not(#autoscroller) 
{
  opacity:0.59 !important;
  box-shadow: 0px 8px 8px !important;
}

/* Custom (or remove) transparency when hovering over menu */
popup:not(#autoscroller):hover
{
  opacity: 1.0 !important;
  box-shadow: 0px 16px 16px
}

menupopup:not(#autoscroller)
{
  opacity:0.59 !important;
  box-shadow: 0px 8px 8px !important;
}
menupopup:not(#autoscroller):hover
{
  opacity: 1.0 !important;
  box-shadow: 0px 16px 16px
}

/* AGENT_SHEET */


scrollbar[orient="vertical"] 
{-moz-appearance: none !important;
border: none !important;
background: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important;}

scrollbar[orient="horizontal"]
{-moz-appearance: none !important;
border: none !important;
background: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important;}

scrollbar thumb[orient="vertical"]
{-moz-appearance: none !important;
border: none !important;
background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #FF0000, #00FFFF) !important;
border-radius: 6px !important;}

scrollbar thumb[orient="horizontal"]
{-moz-appearance: none !important;
border: none !important;
background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, #FF0000, #00FFFF) !important;
border-radius: 6px !important;}

scrollbar thumb[orient="vertical"]:hover
{-moz-appearance: none !important;
border: none !important;
background: -moz-linear-gradient(bottom, #FF0000, #00FFFF) !important;
border-radius: 6px !important;}

scrollbar thumb[orient="horizontal"]:hover
{-moz-appearance: none !important;
border: none !important;
background: -moz-linear-gradient(right, #FF0000, #00FFFF) !important;
border-radius: 6px !important;}

scrollbar scrollbarbutton, scrollbar gripper
{-moz-appearance: none ! important;
background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important;
min-height: 14px !important;
max-height: 14px !important;
min-width: 14px !important;
max-width: 14px !important;
border: none !important;
border-radius: 25px !important;
box-shadow: 0 0 4px 1px #000000 !important;}

/* ==== ONGLETS - COULEURS DIFFÉRENTES - OK AUSTRALIS : DÉBUT ==== */
	/* Suppression des onglets Firefox 29 (Australis) */
	/* Remove New Australis tabs */
#TabsToolbar .tab-background-start,
#TabsToolbar .tab-background-end{
   display: none !important;
}
#TabsToolbar .tab-background-middle,
#TabsToolbar .tab-background{
   background: none !important;
}
	/* Les 14 premiers onglets sont d'une couleur différente, les suivants reprennent la couleur des premiers */
	/* The first 14 tabs are of a different color, the following show the color of the firsts */

:root {
     --tab: Blue;
}
.tabbrowser-tabs tab{overflow-x: hidden !important;}
.tabbrowser-tabs tab:nth-child(14n+01){ 
   background: Red !important;
   color: White !important;
   --tab: Red;
}
.tabbrowser-tabs tab:nth-child(14n+02){
   background: Blue !important;
   color: White !important;
   --tab: Blue;
}
.tabbrowser-tabs tab:nth-child(14n+03){ 
   background: Magenta !important;
   --tab: Magenta;}

.tabbrowser-tabs tab:nth-child(14n+04){
   background: GoldenRod !important;
   color: White !important;
   --tab: GoldenRod;
}
.tabbrowser-tabs tab:nth-child(14n+05){ 
   background: Lime !important;
   --tab: Lime;}
.tabbrowser-tabs tab:nth-child(14n+06){
   background: OrangeRed !important;
   color: White !important;
      --tab: OrangeRed;
}
.tabbrowser-tabs tab:nth-child(14n+07){ 
   background: White !important;
      --tab: White !important;}
.tabbrowser-tabs tab:nth-child(14n+08){
   background: DarkRed !important;
   color: White !important;
            --tab: DarkRed ;
}
.tabbrowser-tabs tab:nth-child(14n+09){ 
   background: Aqua !important;
      --tab: Aqua;}
.tabbrowser-tabs tab:nth-child(14n+10){
   background: DarkMagenta !important;
   color: White !important;
      --tab: DarkMagenta;
}
.tabbrowser-tabs tab:nth-child(14n+11){ 
   background: Yellow !important;}
.tabbrowser-tabs tab:nth-child(14n+12){
   background: Green !important;
   color: White !important;
      --tab: Green;
}
.tabbrowser-tabs tab:nth-child(14n+13){ 
   background: Orange !important;
      --tab: Orange;}
.tabbrowser-tabs tab:nth-child(14n+14){
   background: Black !important;
   color: White !important;
      --tab: Black;
}

	/* Définition des onglets */
	/* Définition of tabs */
.tabbrowser-tabs tab{overflow-x: hidden !important;}
.tabbrowser-tabs .tabbrowser-tab{
   vertical-align: top !important;
   -moz-box-sizing: border-box !important;
   min-width: 150px !important;
}
	/* onglets inactifs */
	/* Inactive tabs */
.tabbrowser-tabs tab:not([selected="true"]){
   opacity: 0.6 !important;
}

.tabbrowser-tabs tab[selected="true"]{
   opacity: 1.0 !important;
}

	/* onglet survolé par la souris */
	/* Tab overed */
.tabbrowser-tabs tab:hover{
   opacity: 0.85 !important;
}
.tabbrowser-tabs tab[selected="true"]:hover{
   opacity: 1.0 !important;
}
	/* onglets en chargement */
	/* Tabs in loading */
.tabbrowser-tabs tab[busy]{
   background: Grey !important;
   color: Gold !important;
   --tab: Grey !important;
}
	/* Adaptation du bouton "Nouvel onglet" */
	/* Adaptation of the button "New tab" */
.tabs-newtab-button{
   -moz-appearance:none !important;
   visibility: visible !important;
   background-color: #FF0000 !important;
}

	/* Adaptation du bouton "Tous les onglets" */
	/* Adaptation of the button "All tabs" */
.tabs-alltabs-button{background-color: Beige !important;}
/* ==== ONGLETS - COULEURS DIFFÉRENTES : FIN ==== */

@-moz-document url(chrome://browser/content/browser.xul) {

/* 
Adjust font-size to change size of icons.
Box size can be changed with padding,
width, and height properties 
*/

#titlebar-min,
#titlebar-max,
#titlebar-close {
-moz-appearance: none !important;
-moz-box-sizing: content-box !important;
margin: 0;
margin-left: 3px;
border: none;
font-size: 12px;
width: 24px;
border-radius: 3px;
box-shadow: inset 0 0 2px #000;
}

/*
=============
Icons order:
 Minimize
 Windows
 Close
 Maximize
=============
*/

#titlebar-min label::after {
content:"\23EC" !important;
}

#titlebar-max label::after {
content:"\259E" !important;
}

#titlebar-close label::after {
content:"\274C" !important;
}

#main-window[sizemode="normal"] #titlebar-max label::after {
content:"\2B1B"  !important;
}

/* ==== colors */

#titlebar-min,
#titlebar-max {
background: linear-gradient(#666,#333);
color: #eee !important;
}

#titlebar-min:hover,
#titlebar-max:hover {
background: linear-gradient(#589CCF,#43749C);
}

#titlebar-close {
color: #fff;
background: linear-gradient(#CE4E31,#9b3a24);
}

#titlebar-close:hover {
background: linear-gradient(#FF613D,#CC4D2F);
}

}

tab .tab-icon, .tab-icon-image, .tab-throbber {
  filter: grayscale(1);
}

#TabsToolbar .tabbrowser-tab[selected] .tab-icon, #TabsToolbar .tabbrowser-tab[selected] .tab-icon-image, #TabsToolbar .tabbrowser-tab[selected] .tab-throbber {
  filter: grayscale(0);
}

/*
 _______________________________________________________________________
|                  |                                                    |
|          Title:  |  Rounded Tooltips (WellRounded) - Global (WOW)     |
|    Description:  |  Rounded Edges on all tooltips WOW                 |
|         Author:  |  -=Ben=-                                           |
|   Date Created:  |  July 3, 2008                                      |
|   Last Updated:  |  July 3, 2008                                      |
|        Version:  |  1.0.0.0                                           |
|__________________|____________________________________________________|
*/

.scrollbutton-up,
.scrollbutton-down {
  transition: box-shadow .5s ease;
}

.scrollbutton-up {
  box-shadow: 6px 0 6px -6px rgba(0,0,0,.4);
}

.scrollbutton-down {
  box-shadow: -6px 0 6px -6px rgba(0,0,0,.4);
}

.scrollbutton-up[disabled="true"],
.scrollbutton-down[disabled="true"] {
  box-shadow: none;
}

body::before {
 content: ""; position: fixed; top: -10px; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 10px; z-index: 100; -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.4); box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.4); box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.4)
}



/* Userstyles.org - Blue, Gray or Green */
/* Created by 90d@userstyles.org */
/* Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License */

@-moz-document url-prefix("https://userstyles.org") {

/*== CODE ==*/

/* Reset */
/* Modified version of Eric Meyer's CSS */

html, body, div, span, applet, object, iframe,
h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, p, blockquote, pre,
a, abbr, acronym, address, big, cite, code,
del, dfn, em, img, ins, kbd, q, s, samp,
small, strike, strong, sub, sup, tt, var,
b, u, i, center,
dl, dt, dd, ol, ul, li,
fieldset, form, label, legend,
table, caption, tbody, tfoot, thead, tr, th, td,
article, aside, canvas, details, embed, 
figure, figcaption, footer, header, hgroup, 
menu, nav, output, ruby, section, summary,
time, mark, audio, video,
input, button, select {
    font-size: 100% !important;
    }

/* General */

body {
    line-height: 1.4em !important;
    margin: 0 auto 2em auto !important;
    max-width: none !important;
    width: 85% !important;
    }

h1 {
    font-size: 1.4em !important;
    }

h2  {
    font-size: 1.2em !important;
    font-weight: bold !important;
    }

/* Header */

header#main-header {
    border-radius: 0 0 1.5em 1.5em !important;
    font-style: oblique !important;
    font-weight: bold !important;
    height: 0 !important;
    margin: 0 !important;
    min-height: 6em !important;
    padding: .5em 0 0 1em !important;
    text-transform: lowercase !important;
    }

header#main-header h1 {
    margin: .5em 0 0 1% !important;
    }

/* Content */

#content-wrapper {
    clear: both !important;
    float: none !important;
    margin: 3em auto 0 !important;
    padding: 1em !important;
    width: 92% !important;
    }

article {
    margin-left: 0 !important;
    }

#main-article {
    margin-top: 2em !important;
    }

/* Navigation: Menu */

#left-sidebar {
    float: none !important;
    width: auto !important;
    margin-left: 0 !important;
    }

#left-sidebar > * {
    border-radius: 0 !important;
    margin: 0 !important;
    padding: 0 !important;
    }

#left-sidebar li {
    display: inline !important;
    margin-bottom: 0 !important;
    }

#left-sidebar nav {
    background-color: transparent !important;
    position: absolute !important;
    top: 1.8em !important;
    right: 12% !important;
    text-align: right;
    }

#left-sidebar nav ul li + li {
    border-radius: .7em !important;
    padding: .4em .7em !important;
    display: inline !important;
    }

#left-sidebar #related {
    background-color: transparent !important;
    position: absolute !important;
    left: 8% !important;
    max-width: 40% !important;
    top: 7.2em !important;
    }

#left-sidebar #related h2 {
    display: inline-block !important;
    font-size: 100% !important;
    font-style: normal !important;
    }

#left-sidebar #related h2:after {
    content: ": " !important;
    }

#left-sidebar #related ul {
    display: inline-block !important;
    }

#left-sidebar #related ul li {
    display: inline !important;
    }

#left-sidebar #related ul li {
    display: none !important;
    }

#left-sidebar #related ul li.more {
    border: none !important;
    display: inline !important;
    }

/* Navigation: Search */
/* Modified version of BarbieGirl's CSS */

#left-sidebar form {
    position: absolute !important;
    right: 5em !important;
    top: 2.5em !important;
    }

#left-sidebar #search-terms {
display: inline !important;
    position: relative !important;
	width: 13em !important;
	float: none !important;
	margin-right: 2.2em !important;
}

#left-sidebar #search-submit {
    position: absolute !important;
	right: 0 !important;
	float: none !important;
}

#left-sidebar #show-advanced-search {
    position: absolute !important;
    right: -5.2em !important;
    top: 0 !important;
    }

#left-sidebar #advanced-search {
    border: none !important;
    min-width: 30em !important;
    position: absolute !important;
    right: -5.2em !important;
    top: 2.3em !important;
    width: 100% !important;
    }
    
#left-sidebar #advanced-search select {
    margin: .2em !important;
    }

/* Your Account: Actions List */

#content-wrapper article ul:first-child li {
    list-style-type: none !important;
    padding: 0 !important;
    }

#content-wrapper article ul:first-child li:before {
    content: '— ' !important;
    }

/* Styles List: Your Own */

.author-styles * {
    line-height: 1em !important;
    }

table.author-styles {
    border-collapse: collapse !important;
    margin: 0 auto !important;
    }

.author-styles th {
    padding: .5em !important;
    }

.author-styles th:first-child {
    border: 0 !important;
    }

.author-styles td {
    padding: .2em .5em !important;
    }

.author-styles td.date-value + td a {
    display: block !important;
    }

.author-styles td.numeric-value,
.author-styles td.image-value {
    width: 2.7em !important;
    }

.author-styles td.date-value {
    width: 7em !important;
    }

.author-styles .date-value {
    text-align: left !important;
    }

.author-styles .numeric-value {
    text-align: center !important;
    }

/* Styles List: Obsolete */

.author-styles .obsolete,
.author-styles .obsolete a {
    text-decoration: none !important;
    }

.author-styles .obsolete + td,
.author-styles .obsolete + td + td,
.author-styles .obsolete + td + td + td ,
.author-styles .obsolete + td + td + td + td,
.author-styles .obsolete + td + td + td + td + td {
    display: none !important;
    }
    
/* Styles List: Other */

.style-brief {
    line-height: 1.15em !important;
    margin-bottom: 1.5em !important;
    padding-left: 20px !important;
    }

.style-brief .listing-left-info {
    min-height: 0 !important;
    margin-right: 20px !important;
    width: 150px !important;
    }

.style-brief .listing-left-info .no-screenshots {
    border-radius: 0 !important;
    margin-top: 0 !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    width: 150px !important;
    }

.style-brief .listing-left-info img {
    width: auto !important;
    }

.style-brief .screenshot-thumbnail {
    max-height: 150px !important;
    text-align: left !important;
    }

.style-brief .screenshot-thumbnail img {
    max-width: 150px !important;
    }

.style-brief .style-brief-text {
    display: inline-block !important;
    margin-left: 0 !important;
    }

.style-brief .style-brief-text header {
    font-weight: bold !important;
    padding-bottom: .5em !important;
    }

.style-brief.good-rating .style-brief-text header {
    padding-left: 20px !important;
    }

.style-brief.bad-rating .style-brief-text header {
    padding-left: 20px !important;
    }

.style-brief .style-brief-text p {
    display: none !important;
    }

.style-brief .style-brief-stats span + span + span {
    display: none !important;
    }

/* Style: Screenshots */

#screenshots {
    background-color: transparent !important;
    border: none !important;
    border-radius: 0 !important;
    float: none !important;
    margin: 0 auto !important;
    min-height: 0 !important;
    padding: 0 !important;
    }

#screenshots img {
    border-radius: 0 1.5em 0 1.5em !important;
    display: block !important;
    margin: 1em auto 0 !important;
    }

#main-screenshot {
    margin: 0 auto !important;
    max-height: 100% !important;
    max-width: 360px !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    }

#more-screenshots {
    text-align: center !important;
    }

#more-screenshots span {
    display: inline-block !important;
    padding: 1.5em 0 0 !important;
    }

#screenshots ul {
    padding-left: 0 !important;
    }

#screenshots .no-screenshots {
    display: none !important;
    }

/* Style: Sections */

section {
    border-radius: 0 1.5em 0 1.5em !important;
    margin: 1.5em 0 !important;
    padding: 1em !important;
    width: auto !important;
    }

section h2 {
    margin: 0 !important;
    margin-bottom: 0.75em !important;
    }

/* Style: Description */

#left-info {
    float: none !important;
    padding-bottom: 0 !important;
    width: auto !important;
    margin: 0 !important;
    }

#style-info {
    margin-left: 0 !important;
    height: auto !important;
    }

#main-style-info {
     margin-left: 0 !important;
     padding: 0 !important;
}

#control-panel {
    font-weight: bold !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    }

#long-description {
    border-radius: 0 1.5em 0 1.5em !important;
    width: auto !important;
    }

#long-description:before {
    content: 'Description' !important;
    display: block !important;
    font-size: 1.2em !important;
    font-style: oblique !important;
    font-weight: bold !important;
    margin-bottom: .75em !important;
    }
    
#style-author-info {
    margin-left: 0 !important;
    margin-right: 0 !important;
}

#style-author-info, #style-install-info {
    display: block !important;
    vertical-align: middle !important;
}

#style-author-info th, #style-install-info th {
    padding-right: 0 !important;
}

#info-tables table * {
    margin: 0 !important;
    padding: 0 !important;
    text-align: left !important;
    width: auto !important;
}

#info-tables table th {
    min-width: 13em !important;
}

/* Style: Install */

.install-status {
    border-radius: 0 !important;
    margin: .4em 0 0 !important;
    max-width: none !important;
    padding: 0 !important;
    }

.install-status p {
    margin: 0 !important;
    }

.install,
.install:hover,
.no-install,
.install-info {
    background: none !important;
    }

.install-info,
.install {
    border-radius: .7em !important;
    font-weight: bold !important;
    padding: .7em !important;
    text-align: center !important;
    width: 15em !important;
    }

.install-symbol {
    display: none !important;
    }

#switch-browser-note {
    margin-top: .5em !important;
    }

#post-install-ad {
    display: none !important;
    }

/* Style: More Info */

#miscellaneous-info {
    margin: 0 !important;
    float: none !important;
    }

#additional-info {
    margin-top: .75em !important;
    }

.license-image {
    float: none !important;
    display: block !important;
    margin-bottom: .5em !important;
    }

/* Edit Style */

.form-controls th {
    font-size: 100% !important;
    font-style: oblique !important;
    padding-right: 1em !important;
    vertical-align: top !important;
    }

.form-controls td {
    padding-bottom: 2em !important;
    }

.form-controls dt {
    font-weight: bold !important;
    }

.form-controls dd {
    margin-bottom: 1em !important;
    }

.form-controls img {
    width: 70% !important;
    }

#edit-style-settings input {
    margin: .5em;
    }

/* Footer */

footer { display: none !important; }
#style-author, #related { display: block !important; }

/*== END CODE ==*/
/*== COLORS ==*/

/* General */

body {
    background: #fff !important;
    color: #000 !important;
    }

a, a:visited { color: #444 !important; }
a:hover, a:visited:hover { color: #000 !important; }

/* Header */

header#main-header {
    background-color: #609dd6 !important;
    color: #fff !important;
    }

header#main-header a {
    color: #111 !important;
    }

header#main-header a:hover {
    color: #fff !important;
    }

/* Navigation: Menu */

#left-sidebar nav ul li + li {
    background-color: #c7e0f6 !important;
    color: #3a3a3a !important;
    }

#left-sidebar nav ul li + li a {
    color: #3a3a3a !important;
    }

#left-sidebar nav ul li + li:hover {
    background-color: #4C4C4C !important;
    color: #fff !important;
    }

#left-sidebar nav ul li + li:hover > a,
#left-sidebar nav ul li + li a:hover {
    color: #fff !important;
    }

/* Navigation: Search */

#left-sidebar #show-advanced-search {
    color: #fff !important;
    }

/* Your Account: Styles List */

.author-styles tbody tr:nth-child(2n) td {
    background-color: #F9F8F8 !important;
    }
    
.author-styles tbody tr:hover td {
    background-color: #dadada !important;
    }
    
.author-styles th,
.author-styles td {
    border: 1px solid #a1a1a1;
    }

/* Your Account: Obsolete Styles */

.author-styles .obsolete,
.author-styles .obsolete a {
    color: #a1a1a1 !important;
    }

/* Other Author: Styles List */

.style-brief {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #a1a1a1 !important;
    }

.style-brief .listing-left-info .no-screenshots {
    background-color: #fff !important;
    color: #000 !important;
    }

/* Style: Obsolete */

#obsoletion-message {
    background-color: #c7e0f6 !important;
    }

/* Style: Screenshots */

#screenshots img {
    border: 1px solid #cacaca !important;
    }

/* Style: Sections */

section {
    background-color: #eaeaea !important;
    }

/* Style: Description */

#long-description {
    background-color: #eaeaea !important;
    }

/* Style: Install */

.install-status {
    color: #000 !important;
    }

.install-info,
.install {
    background-color: #fff !important;
    }

.install-info:hover,
.install:hover {
    background-color: #ccc !important;
    }

}

/* GENERAL */
tooltip {
-moz-appearance: none !important;
opacity: 0.95 !important;
padding: 12px !important;
border-image-source: url("data:image/png;base64,") !important;
border-image-slice: 15 fill !important;
border-image-width: 15px !important;
border-image-repeat: repeat !important;
background: none !important;
}
tooltip label {
margin: 0px !important;
padding: 0px 3px 4px !important;
color: #fff !important;text-align: center !important;
font-family: Space Invaders !important;
font-size: 12pt !important;
}

.tabbrowser-tabs  {
   background: linear-gradient(300deg,rgba(255,0,0,0.45),rgba(0,0,0,0.45), rgba(0,255,255,0.45)) no-repeat !important;
}

.menupopup-drop-indicator 
{ height: 5px !important;
background: linear-gradient(to left, red, rgba(0,0,0,0.9), red) no-repeat !important; }

.panel-arrowcontent
{ -moz-appearance: none !important; 
border-radius: 25px !important;
border: 13px solid rgba(0,0,0,.9) !important;
background: radial-gradient(at top, rgba(166, 193, 224, .9), rgba(0,0,8, .9)) no-repeat !important;
box-shadow: 4px 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0, .9) !important; 
color: #D0D4C4 !important;
}

}

}

#context-stop {

}

menuitem[key="key_paste"],
menuitem[commandname="cmd-paste"],
#platypus-paste,
#platypus-paste-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
#gspace_remotePaste,
#placesContext_paste,
#appmenu-paste
{ -moz-image-region: rect(0, 160px, 16px, 144px) !important; list-style-image: url("data:image/png;base64,") !important; }

   
   
   /*SVG Colors for buttons */
@-moz-document url(chrome://browser/content/browser.xul),
			   url(chrome://global/content/customizeToolbar.xul){

	#save-page-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#developer-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#preferences-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#webrtc-status-button .toolbarbutton-icon{ 
	  filter: url(chrome://cstbb-extension/content/filters.svg#matrix-b) !important;
	}

	#ctraddon_back-button .toolbarbutton-icon, 
	#ctraddon_forward-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#new-window-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#new-tab-button .toolbarbutton-icon,

	#zoom-in-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#copy-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#add-ons-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#find-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#sidebar-button .toolbarbutton-icon	{ 
	  filter: url(chrome://cstbb-extension/content/filters.svg#matrix-ygg) !important;
	}

	#PanelUI-quit:not(:hover) .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#web-apps-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#e10s-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#panic-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	toolbarbutton[id^="loop-"]:not([state="error"]):not([state="action"]):not([state="active"]),
	.tabs-closebutton:hover .toolbarbutton-icon,
	.tab-close-button:hover .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#urlbar-stop-button:hover,
	#cut-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#zoom-out-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#stop-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#ctraddon_stop-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#characterencoding-button .toolbarbutton-icon	{ 
	  filter: url(chrome://cstbb-extension/content/filters.svg#matrix-r) !important;
	}
	#ctraddon_history-menu-toolbar-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#history-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#history-panelmenu .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#ctraddon_history-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#fullscreen-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#urlbar-reload-button:hover,
	#paste-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#reload-button .toolbarbutton-icon{ 
	  filter: url(chrome://cstbb-extension/content/filters.svg#matrix-cbb) !important;
	}

	#urlbar[level="broken"] #page-proxy-favicon { 
	  filter: url(chrome://cstbb-extension/content/filters.svg#matrix-rry) !important;
	}

	#feed-button .toolbarbutton-icon { 
	  filter: url(chrome://cstbb-extension/content/filters.svg#matrix-ry) !important;
	}

	#PanelUI-customize .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#password-notification-icon,
	#open-file-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#email-link-button .toolbarbutton-icon { 
	  filter: url(chrome://cstbb-extension/content/filters.svg#matrix-ryy) !important;
	}
	
	#PanelUI-fxa-status .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#sync-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#tabview-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#social-share-button .toolbarbutton-icon { 
	  filter: url(chrome://cstbb-extension/content/filters.svg#matrix-c) !important;
	}

	#privatebrowsing-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#print-button .toolbarbutton-icon { 
	  filter: url(chrome://cstbb-extension/content/filters.svg#matrix-bmm) !important;
	}
	
	#webide-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#PanelUI-help:not(:hover) .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#PanelUI-menu-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#nav-bar-overflow-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#classic_bm_button23-toolbar-button > .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#ctraddon_bookmarks-menu-toolbar-button .toolbarbutton-icon,
	#ctraddon_bookmarks-button .toolbarbutton-icon	{ 
	  filter: url(chrome://cstbb-extension/content/filters.svg#matrix-cb) !important;
	}
	
	#urlbar-icons #bookmarks-menu-button .toolbarbutton-icon { 
	  filter: none !important;
	}

	.searchbar-dropmarker-image,
	.urlbar-history-dropmarker { 
	  filter: url(chrome://cstbb-extension/content/filters.svg#desat-0) !important;
	}

}
}
}
